GSD.description:
ext4: fix bug in extents parsing when eh_entries == 0 and eh_depth > 0

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.12 by commit 2f5e9de15e4f55fbf56f22d4a2ce406246cc462d. For more details please see the references link.
